text: While I'm cautiously excited for Streets of Rage 4, the first sequel after more than 20 years, all I really care about is if Yuzo Koshiro will be back as the composer. It would be a travesty if not. It's funny how I posted a theme from the obscure Streets of Fury back in 2009, developped by the team that is now involved in SoR4!
author: SupraDarky

text:
You should consider adding "Super Earth Defense Force - Midnight Intercept" to your playlist (Unless you have already). It's so good

author: en

text: Did you play Streets of Rage "Remake" which was remade by a fan and allowed for you to play through with with 1,2, or 3's fighting mechanics, stages, and unlockables like Shiva and a bunch of other bosses as well. All the music had amazing remixes as well. You should still be able to download it for free somewhere online.

text: Late to the party, but yes Yuzo is coming back.
